summary: Bayou La Teche, Louisiana sizzles as the Cajun town celebrates the wedding of Splendid and Dolan. The trouble comes off the yun the wedding night when Splendid is determined to maintain her... See full summary Â»
cast: Faye Dunaway|Denholm Elliott|James Earl Jones|Emily Lloyd|Jennifer Tilly|James Wilder|Anthony Geary|Leland Crooke|Luke Perry|Kevin Michael Brown|Michael Covert|Saxon Trainor|Steve LeFleur|Jonno Frishberg|Joe Fontenot|Kevin Sonnier|Patrick Warburton|Carter Burwell|Myra Paci|Jeff Moore
title: Cuerpos ardientes
